text: Condor (formerly El Condor) is a steel roller coaster at Walibi Holland in The Netherlands. The ride was built by Vekoma as the first suspended looping coaster in the world.El Condor on the Roller coaster database == Gallery == File:CFilms - El Condor . title: Condor (roller coaster)
